tool_description: Clean My Mail is an api that allows you to validate a list of emails and see whether they are valid or not
name: Email Cleaner
title: Email Cleaner

api_list.name: Validate emails
api_list.description: Takes a string of emails seperated by commas and returns a list of which are valid.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-cleaner.p.rapidapi.com/api/validate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-cleaner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://email-cleaner.p.rapidapi.com/api/validate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-cleaner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
